text: Ara musa yakhana nija jatira jan'ya pani ca'ila, takhana ami balalama, sbiya yasthira dbara aghata kara patharera upare. Atahpara ta theke prabahita haye ela barati prasrabana. Tadera saba gotra'i cine nila nija nija ghata. Allahara deya riyika kha'o, pana kara ara duniyara buke danga-hangama kare beri'o na.
